meanings.definition: The body of a motor vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The coachworks of the car was sleek and shiny.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic repaired the coachworks of the truck.
meanings.sent3: The coachworks of the old car looked like a shiny shell.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed around her like the coachworks of a car.
meanings.sent5: The coachworks of the vehicle gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The work or business of constructing or repairing vehicle bodies.
meanings.sent1: He specialized in coachworks and was a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent2: The company excelled in coachworks, creating custom designs.
meanings.sent3: The coachworks shop was always busy with repairs and modifications.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in coachworks was like that of a master artist.
meanings.sent5: The coachworks business boomed due to their excellent reputation.
